summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1670, for the improvement of Bagley Avenue and Corliss Avenue, each from North Forty-fifth Street to the north line of Baltimore Addition to the City of Seattle; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, together with the necessary drainage, under Ordinance No. 17684, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
